Zachariah or Zacharias__05.1__A volume: : That is, a parchment, according to the form of the ancient books, which, from being rolled up, were called volumes.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.6__This is their eye: : This is what they fix their eye upon: or this is a resemblance and figure of them, viz., of sinners.
Zachariah or Zacharias__05.11__The land of Sennaar: : Where Babel or Babylon was built, Gen. 11., where note, that Babylon in holy writ is often taken for the city of the devil: that is, for the whole congregation of the wicked: as Jerusalem is taken for the city and people of God.
